title: Drawing, "Studies.   A. "Cocoa Nut Palm".  B. Parasite" winding around a tree trunk. C. "Small Fan Palm". Jamaica, West Indies.", June 1865
medium: Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457c
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at various points: cactus /  " ..... [?] nest" / original tree; and at bottom right:  Parasite / Jamaica June / 1865
Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at center: strangler fig
description: Vertical view of a parasite, a strangler fig, winding around a palm trunk, and a section of a stem at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies.   A. "Cocoa Nut Palm".  B. Parasite" winding around a tree trunk. C. "Small Fan Palm". Jamaica, West Indies.", June 1865.
June 1865. Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-6-b.
